description: A few kilometres from the monastery of Camaldoli, Il Cedro celebrates home-style Tuscan cooking, which is simple yet full of flavour. Two sisters are at the helm here: one in the kitchen, and the other offering friendly service front of house, where she announces the daily specials at your table. Fresh produce and specialities from the Casentino are to the fore.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
